## Description {#details}

There are fields(sizes, offsets) which should be updated after sections are generated.

To remember offsets and related data the descendants of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectionpatch">SectionPatch</a> structure should be used.

Definition at line 41 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/outputsections-h">OutputSections.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>
